annotations.description: The Brancolada was one of the very best cocktails i had in 2019 and a definite highlight of my New York trip. Stoked to be able to share the recipe with you!...
annotations.title: Brancolada one of the very best drinks I had this year!

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Jamaica Rum
1oz (30ml) Fernet Branca Menta
1.5oz (45ml) Pineapple Juice
1oz (30ml) Coconut Cream
.25oz (7.5ml) Orange Juice
Mint Sprig and Half Orange Wheel Garnish

Blend or whip shake and pour topping with crushed ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HUAHji-UhZk&list=TLPQMTMxMjIwMTkacqXA8LRJFA&index=2
title: Brancolada
